text: Tamezret or Tamazrat () is a Tunisian Berber village located in the south-east of the country, about ten kilometers from Matmata and forty kilometers southwest of the capital of the governorate of Gabès on which it depends. Ridge village built on the four slopes of one of the highest hills of the Matmata mountains.(480 m altitude). == Related pages == * List of cities in Tunisia * Gabès == References == Category:Villages in Tunisia
title: Tamezret
